MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 6:49pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and have advised that they will have to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm until 10:30pm to make repairs to faulty electrical equipment. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:15pm on 13th April 2021.
